targets.expr: max by(instance, zpool, state) (max_over_time(zfs_pool_size_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool"}[$__range]))
max by(instance, zpool) (last_over_time(zfs_pool_vdevs{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool"}[$__range]))
max by(instance, zpool) (last_over_time(zfs_pool_errors{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool"}[$__range]))

options.content:
L2ARC vdev is not tracked by the exporter,
and ZFS doesn't expose separate per-pool statistics for L2ARC.

targets.expr:
min by(instance, zpool, vdev) (min_over_time(zfs_vdev_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", path=""}[$__interval]))
or
min by(instance, zpool, vdev) (min_over_time(zfs_vdev_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", vdev=~"disk-.*"}[$__interval]))

max by(instance, zpool) (
(max_over_time(node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", state="online"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 2
or
(max_over_time(node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", state="offline"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 3
or
(max_over_time(node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", state="removed"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 4
or
(max_over_time(node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", state="degraded"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 5
or
(max_over_time(node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", state="faulted"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 6
or
(max_over_time(node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", state="suspended"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 7
or
(max_over_time(node_zfs_zpool_state{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", state="unavail"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 8
)
sum by(instance, zpool, vdev) (rate(zfs_vdev_errors{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev"}[$__rate_interval])) != bool 0

max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_ashift_configured{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path="", vdev=~"$vdev"}[$__range]))
or
# use device-specific metric if separate vdev metric is missing (usually the case for sinlge-device vdevs)
max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_ashift_configured{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", vdev=~"disk-.*"}[$__range]))

max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_children{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path="", vdev=~"$vdev"}[$__range]))
# children doesn't exist and doesn't make sense for single-device vdevs

max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_errors{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path="", vdev=~"$vdev"}[$__range]))
or
# use device-specific metric if separate vdev metric is missing (usually the case for sinlge-device vdevs)
max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_errors{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", vdev=~"disk-.*"}[$__range]))

max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_self_healed_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path="", vdev=~"$vdev"}[$__range]))
or
# use device-specific metric if separate vdev metric is missing (usually the case for sinlge-device vdevs)
max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_self_healed_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", vdev=~"disk-.*"}[$__range]))

max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_slow_ios{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", path="", vdev=~"$vdev"}[$__range]))
or
# use device-specific metric if separate vdev metric is missing (usually the case for sinlge-device vdevs)
max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_slow_ios{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", vdev=~"disk-.*"}[$__range]))

max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_space_capacity_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", path=""}[$__interval]))
or
# use device-specific metric if separate vdev metric is missing (usually the case for sinlge-device vdevs)
max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_space_capacity_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", vdev=~"disk-.*"}[$__interval]))

avg by(instance, zpool, vdev) (avg_over_time(zfs_vdev_space_allocated_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", path=""}[$__interval]))
or
# use device-specific metric if separate vdev metric is missing (usually the case for sinlge-device vdevs)
avg by(instance, zpool, vdev) (avg_over_time(zfs_vdev_space_allocated_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", vdev=~"disk-.*"}[$__interval]))

avg by(instance, zpool, vdev) (avg_over_time(zfs_vdev_fragmentation{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", path=""}[$__interval]))
or
# use device-specific metric if separate vdev metric is missing (usually the case for sinlge-device vdevs)
avg by(instance, zpool, vdev) (avg_over_time(zfs_vdev_fragmentation{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", vdev=~"disk-.*"}[$__interval]))

avg by(instance, zpool, vdev) (
  avg_over_time(zfs_vdev_space_allocated_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", path=""}[$__interval])
  /
  (avg_over_time(zfs_vdev_space_capacity_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", path=""}[$__interval]) != 0)
)
or
avg by(instance, zpool, vdev) (
  avg_over_time(zfs_vdev_space_allocated_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", vdev=~"disk-.*"}[$__interval])
  /
  (avg_over_time(zfs_vdev_space_capacity_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", vdev=~"disk-.*"}[$__interval]) != 0)
)
max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (rate(zfs_vdev_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", path="", type="read"}[$__rate_interval]))
max by(instance, zpool, vdev, path) (rate(zfs_vdev_bytes{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", path="", type="write"}[$__rate_interval]))
max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (rate(zfs_vdev_ops{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", path="", type="read"}[$__rate_interval]))
max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (rate(zfs_vdev_ops{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", path="", type="write"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: includes queue and disk read itself. Missing if there were no operation.

targets.expr: max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_zio_latency_total_bucket:quantile_irate{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", path="", type="read", quantile="0.99"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: read latency p99 (zio)

panels.description: includes queue and disk read itself. Missing if there were no operation.

targets.expr: max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_zio_latency_total_bucket:quantile_irate{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", path="", type="write", quantile="0.99"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: write latency p99 (zio)

panels.description: includes only disk operation. Missing if there were no operation.

targets.expr: max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_latency_disk_bucket:quantile_irate{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", path="", type="read", quantile="0.99"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: read latency p99 (disk)

panels.description: includes only disk operation. Missing if there were no operation.

targets.expr: max by(instance, zpool, vdev) (max_over_time(zfs_vdev_latency_disk_bucket:quantile_irate{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", vdev=~"$vdev", path="", type="write", quantile="0.99"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: write latency p99 (disk)
